title: Hebrew Clock - Watch Face
summary: Hebrew watch face for Android Wear.

descriptionHTML:
This is an analogue clock for Android Wear that displays time and date in Hebrew.

Features
• Themes
• Customize colors, hand thickness, font, indicators, and more.
• Battery level
• Day of the week
• Day of the month
• Font
• Reverse clock movement

Configure the watch face on your phone.

Requirements
• Phone with Android 4.3+
• Wearable device with Android 5.0+

Translations
The app is translated into the following languages:
• English
• Hebrew (partially)
• Dutch
Want to help translate Hebrew Clock? Please contact us by email.
recentChanges: • Introducing new watch face with custom options for colors, fonts, hands, reversed layout and more.
• Supported languages on the Hebrew Clock are: English, Hebrew, Dutch.
